trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for developers to specify custom editing controls that are associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 为开发人员指定与之关联的自定义编辑控件提供一个接口<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The IWebEditable interface enables you to associate custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls with a server control--such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, a user control, or a custom server control.
trans-unit.target: IWebEditable 界面使您可以关联自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件有一个服务器控件-如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件、 一个用户控件或自定义服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls are contained with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, and this zone with its editing controls provides end users with a user interface (UI) for modifying properties, appearance, and behavior on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件包含与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控件，并具有其编辑控件的此区域提供用于修改属性、 外观和行为关联的用户界面 (UI) 的最终用户<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebEditable interface includes two exposed members.
trans-unit.target: IWebEditable 接口包含两个公开的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A> property provides a way for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to get a reference to the associated server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A>属性提供一种方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，以获得对关联的服务器控件的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.WebBrowsableObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method is used to create an instance of each custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control associated with a server control, and return them as a collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法用于创建的每个自定义实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件与服务器控件关联，并将它们恢复为一个集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IWebEditable interface is already implemented on the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, although by default this implementation does not associate any custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 已在基的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类，尽管默认情况下所有自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>不将此实现关联</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>上实现 IWebEditable 接口

trans-unit.source: To associate a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control with custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将关联派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>具有自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls associated with a server control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回的自定义集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>与实现的服务器控件关联的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: The CreateEditorParts method enables you to create a collection of all the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls associated with your custom control, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, or user control, and return them as an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateEditorParts 方法使您能够创建的所有自定义集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>自定义控件，与关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件或用户控件，并将它们作为返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control takes the collection and creates instances of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls whenever the server control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件采用该集合并创建的所有实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，无论何时服务器控件进入编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Typically you implement this method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by overriding its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在自定义实现此方法通常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件通过重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In the method, you create instances of the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls you want to associate with your controls, add them to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object, and then return that object.
trans-unit.target: 在方法中，则创建的自定义实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>你想要将你的控件，与关联的控件将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>对象，，然后返回该对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls is then assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件然后分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> that is added to the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in an implementation of the CreateEditorParts method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>，它将添加到的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>CreateEditorParts 方法的实现中的控件必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> that contains the collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls associated with a server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> ，包含的自定义集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>与服务器控件关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, user control, or custom control that will be edited by <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件、 用户控件或自定义控件，将通过编辑<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The WebBrowsableObject property provides a way for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to get a reference to the server controls they are associated with.
trans-unit.target: WebBrowsableObject 属性提供一种方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件以获取对与之关联的服务器控件的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Although the property itself is read-only, the object reference that it returns enables <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to change values in the server control.
trans-unit.target: 虽然在属性本身是只读的但它将返回的对象引用使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件来更改服务器控件中的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An object reference to the control associated with an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对与关联的控件的对象引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref>控件。
